Title: YYYYMMDDhhmmssToDateTime
Description: Converts a number containing the year, month, day, hours, minute and second number to a DateTime.
The output is undefined if the input does not encode a valid DateTime value.
This function is the opposite of function toYYYYMMDDhhmmss().
yyyymmddhhmmss - A number representing the year, month and day. Integer, Float or Decimal.timezone - Timezone for the returned value (optional).
a date with time created from the arguments. DateTime.
